name: Candy Clicker (Kustt)
description:
~About

Candy Clicker is a clicker type game with a sweet theme. It was made for Halloween in 2 days. 

~How to play

In order to play you need to push the generate button to of course generate sweets. There are 4 types of sweets and one of them is free,the rest can be purchased from the store.You can also upgrade some powers to make your job easier and faster.In the right corner,up you can see a button that shows what sweets are you generating.If you click on it you can select between sweets.

~Achievement

In order to complete the game you must have all the sweets and 1000 points for each.

~Credits

-Me(Kustt) - developer

-Some assets from the asset store

~Tools

-Unity with C#
